[console_scripts]
epic-server = epicman.server:main
epic-server-startup = epicman.server.startup:main

[epicman.server.db.backends]
dbm = epicman.server.db.dbm:create_db
default = epicman.server.db.dict:create_db
dict = epicman.server.db.dict:create_db
lmbd = epicman.server.db.lmdb:create_db [lmdb]
sqlite = epicman.server.db.sqlite:create_db
